dcterms:creator: F. Fernández
M. Veloso
dcterms:description: A grid-based robot navigation domain used to demonstrate the efficiency and robustness of the proposed method for selecting source policies in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Grid-based Robot Navigation Domain

dcterms:creator: F. Fernández
M. Veloso
dcterms:description: A dataset that implements probabilistic policy reuse in reinforcement learning, allowing for the selection of source tasks based on their relevance to the target task.
dcterms:title: PRQL (Probabilistic Policy Reuse in Reinforcement Learning)

dcterms:creator: H. B. Ammar
E. Eaton
M. E. Taylor
J.-Y. Mocanu
D. C. Driessens
K. Weiss
K. Tuyls
dcterms:description: A library of source tasks used to measure MDP similarity for transfer in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Source Task Library

dcterms:creator: R. Ramakrishnan
C. Zhang
J. Shah
dcterms:description: A framework for multi-task learning that allows for the simultaneous learning of multiple tasks in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Multi-task Learning (MTL) Framework

dcterms:creator: A. Barreto
R. Munos
T. Schaul
D. Silver
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the concept of successor features for transfer in reinforcement learning, providing a framework for understanding how knowledge can be transferred between tasks.
dcterms:title: Successor Features for Transfer in Reinforcement Learning
